General.Name: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: The Brooker Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in business and financial consulting, and investment activities in Thailand and internationally. The company provides investment banking and financial consulting services, such as mergers and acquisitions, loan refinancing, rehabilitation, and other capital raising on equity and debt securities; planning and negotiations services; and company valuation and advisory services on investments and joint ventures to multinational companies. It also offers capital for growing companies and leveraged buy-outs; and research services, including industrial market research, B2B market survey, customer satisfaction research, industry and trade surveys, market feasibility study, acquisition research, customized market intelligence/in-depth research, and product and service concept/development test. In addition, the company provides real estate consultancy services comprising specialized services in industrial and commercial real estate properties; transaction, advisory, location consulting, asset recovery, and special property services; and disposition and acquisition, advisory and consulting, and property management services. Further, it offers feasibility study, business plan and strategy, company structure and financing, management consultancy, and financial restructuring services for SME firms; and capital management services. Additionally, the company provides fund management services for foreign investors. The Brooker Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
